Name: Immortal Girl
About the game: Died immediately! Immediate retry! Find out how to capture while dying! The immortal maiden 'Kagura' who wishes to die. Challenge The Belflame Castle for the Jewel of Death 'LARS' which gives death to anything. However, Belflame Castle is a trap to block the way. At first glance, there is also an unreasonable trap that cannot be seen first.While remembering the strategy while dying to manipulate Kagura that revives many times even if you die, capture the impresalytable Belflame Castle to get the Jewel of Death 'LARS.' Abundant action Plenty of actions such as throwing knives and dashing in the air! Use the action to clear the stage! CHARACTER KAGURA A maiden who has lived for thousands of years. She hopes to die tired of living, and has traveled hundreds of years. She heard of rumors of LARS, the Jewel of Death, which gives death to anything. It takes hundreds of years to finally find The Belflame Castle, where LARS sleeps. Belflame Castle is a place where many traps block the way. She will continue to challenge for 'LARS' taking advantage of the characteristic that revives many times...
